title: Haven of peace
creator_credit: Department of Social Development (Dar-es-Salaam) and African Film Productions
brief_description: Considers the place of Dar-es-Salam in the development of a large multi-racial community. The port is represented as a colorful mixture of the old and the new, its traditional life and culture existing side by side with modern health, education and social services, housing schemes, and improvements in trade and communications.
